org.stellar.sdk.responses.operations

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stellar.sdk.responses.operations.Operation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountMergeOperation, AllowTrustOperation, ChangeTrustOperation, CreateAccountOperation, CreatePassiveOfferOperation, InflationOperation, ManageOfferOperation, PathPaymentOperation, PaymentOperation, SetOptionsOperation

    public abstract class Operation
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for operation responses.
    See Also:
    Operation documentation, OperationsRequestBuilder, Server.operations()
